title: Google TV’s ‘Library’ tab failing to load for some users, preventing access to watchlist, more
content:
The Google TV homescreen makes it easy to find the content you want across your favorite streaming services, but it also has native access to shows and movies you’ve purchased from Google. Lately, though, the “Library” tab of Google TV seems to be having some loading issues for some.

more…

The post Google TV’s ‘Library’ tab failing to load for some users, preventing access to watchlist, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The "Library" tab of Google TV is seeing an issue for some users where the tab won't load any content, including purchased movies.
